Name: Cybershift
About the game: Cybershift is a 3D Puzzle game from a cyberpunk environment that may resemble the legendary Tron series. In the game you have a clear task, to survive! To survive as long as possible, your bot will have to compete or cooperate with other entities. During the game you will discover various interesting locations, which together with the music, is handcrafted to the smallest detail, which will further enhance your gaming experience. It's up to you how you deal with the many different pitfalls and whether your keyboard will survive to the end. Features Puzzle mode In addition to the number of enemies eager to defeat you, you will also have to fight for tools, without which you won't make it to the next level. Various NPCs During the game, you can never be sure of your own safety, enemies are waiting on every corner to thwart your winning campaign. Handcrafted world and music Unlike similar games, Cybershift is not automatically generated, but we designed and created the music and the environment down to the last detail. That will bring you an even more intense and sophisticated gaming experience. Challenge your perseverance Test your reflexes and endurance with Cybershift. With many increasingly challenging levels, you can be sure that only the best of you will win Cybershift.
